name: Weimin Wu
story: Ru Tan was born and raised in the rural regions of China. He worked as a farmer before joining the People's Liberation Army. He climbed the ranks quickly thanks to his tactical skills and leadership abilities. Tan was recruited to the OPFOR faction to lead a specialized Recon Team tasked with gathering key intel in the Tanoa islands. Despite the dangers of the mission, Tan remains calm and collected, always striving to complete his objectives with utmost efficiency.
